title: Unable to delete selected emails
content: I use TBird/GMail on two Windows 11 machines - a desktop and a laptop. In my All Mail folder there many emails promoting misc items, in fact over 1000 that I do not want. I have set server settings to delete immediately but no matter how I try the deleted emails reappear. They are not in the Bin or Trash. I get the same results using either the laptop or the desktop. Any ideas?
creator: b.chapman093

title: where does Thunderbird android email app save downloaded messages?
content: I got an email with a dozen or so mp3 files attached and wanted to download them in one go onto my android phone. I chose "download complete message " thinking that would work. But no. The files don't appear in the downloads folder so I'm going to download each one separately. But I'd still like to find where the "complete message" was saved so I can delete it. Regards, Ian
creator: IanStar
